alert.note: Alert for Jackson (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 08 at 4:56PM EDT until August 08 at 6:30PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Jackson County in the Panhandle of Florida... Northwestern Decatur County in southwestern Georgia... Miller County in southwestern Georgia... Central Mitchell County in southwestern Georgia... Baker County in southwestern Georgia... Early County in southwestern Georgia... Seminole County in southwestern Georgia... * Until 630 PM EDT/530 PM CDT/. * At 456 PM EDT/356 PM CDT/, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Blakely to near Slocomb, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Colquitt, Newton, Graceville, Donalsonville, Blakely, Camilla, Arlington, Columbia, Douglasville, Centerville, Malone, Greenwood, Gordon, Iron City, Damascus, Campbellton, Brinson, Jakin, Bascom and Iveys Mill. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Tallahassee.
